document.body:
On this page you will find some samples generated by bpm4struts, you are able to download both UML models and web application bundles.
Online-store
This sample is the one explained in the how-to, take a look at the model in the binary distribution, you will find it in /samples/online-store/mda/src/uml/online-store.xml.zip; you will be able to build a deployable .ear bundle from there (you will need to have Maven installed to build, and JBoss to be able to deploy).
In order to get the most out of this sample you should take note of the following points:
Any web container able to deploy EAR bundles should work.
Point your browser to the following URL:
http://127.0.0.1:8080/OnlineStore/
Follow this link to see this sample application running, what you will see is purely generated from UML using bpm4struts, no manual implementation has been added.
http://www.andromda.org/OnlineStore/
